name: Temple Coffee Roasters
description: A popular spot known for its high-quality, single-origin coffees and modern, sleek cafes.

name: Insight Coffee Roasters
description: Focused on sourcing and roasting the best coffees from around the world. They have a relaxed, community-focused vibe.

name: Old Soul Co.
description: A coffee roaster, bakery, and eatery with a rustic, industrial-chic atmosphere. They emphasize farm-to-table ingredients.

name: Pachamama Coffee
description: A 100% farmer-owned cooperative, offering organic coffee with a focus on sustainability and fair trade.

name: The Mill
description: A charming and stylish cafe known for its unique flavored lattes and homemade waffles.
